title: Signals​
content: </> interface Signals { playerProfileLoaded: Signal-- fires when a player profile is loaded beforePlayerRemoving: Signal-- fires before a player profile is being released }

title: init​
content: </> ProfileService:init( databaseName: string,-- The name of the database profileTemplate: table-- The data template ) → () Initialize the system

title: start​
content: </> ProfileService:start() → () Start the system, load player profiles, register player added and data changed

title: Set​
content: </> ProfileService:Set( player: Player ,-- Target player path: string,-- path to the data newValue: string | number | boolean-- value to set ) → () Set value on path. Cannot set tables directly

title: AddTable​
content: </> ProfileService:AddTable( player: Player ,-- Target player path: string,-- path to the data value: table,-- table to append key: string-- optional key to insert the table ) → () Set value on path

title: Increment​
content: </> ProfileService:Increment( player: Player ,-- Target player path: string,-- path to the data value: number-- number to increment ) → () Increment number on path

title: Delete​
content: </> ProfileService:Delete( player: Player ,-- Target player path: string-- path to the data ) → () Delete value on path

title: GetPlayerData​
content: </> ProfileService:GetPlayerData( player: Player -- Target player ) → {any} Return the player profile data

title: GetPlayerDataAsync​
content: </> ProfileService:GetPlayerDataAsync( player: Player -- Target player ) → Promise<ProfileService.Profile> Return the player profile within a Promise

title: GetPlayerProfile​
content: </> ProfileService:GetPlayerProfile( player: Player -- Target player ) → ProfileService.Profile Return the player profile
